page.title: 03A usual day in my life
page.content: I am a boy attending Whittlesford Primary school. On a usual day, I wake up at about 7.30 and start playing with my toys. At about 8.00, I get washed and go down stairs for breakfast. In the kitchen I usually find my mum preparing my packed lunch. After breakfast I go to school. At school I play a few games before I go into the class at 8.55. In class we read until assembly and after that we do maths. In the middle of maths we go out to play. After play we do some more maths and some English. At 12.00 we have dinner followed by dinner play. When we come back in we do all sorts of different things, such as English, reading and self-chosen study. My study is aircraft. When we have done all this we go out to play. After play we read and the teacher reads to us until home time.
